api.privacyNotice.description:
The social features of QUTMC Quick use AxolotlClient and are subject to their terms of service and privacy policy.

You are free to accept or deny them, but in case of the latter some features will not be available:

- Friends
- Friends Chat
- Join a friends world (can join by e4mc ip if denied)
- Join a server friends are playing
- Badge for other QUTMC Quick users on servers

You can update this decision at any time.
